text: Night Crossing is a 1982 American British Cold War drama movie directed by Delbert Mann and starring John Hurt, Doug McKeon, Beau Bridges, Jane Alexander, Kay Walsh, Glynnis O'Connor, Ian Bannen, Anne Stallybrass and Sky Dumont. It was distributed by Walt Disney Productions. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 drama movies Category:1982 war movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:British drama thriller movies Category:British war movies Category:Movies set in Berlin Category:Cold War movies Category:Movies directed by Delbert Mann Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Disney movies Category:1982 thriller movies
title: Night Crossing
